attributes.action: Go onto his knees and say sorry for how he has treated Mrs Jacqui Janes concerning her son
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A shambolic letter full of mistakes that appeared to be written with very little thought. The full story can be read at the following site http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/campaigns/our_boys/2722174/Mum-Jacqui-Janes-at-war-PM-is-humbled.html

And once again with the embarrassing phone call made to her to try and cover his back
